CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE based on this polymer arrived 1.1% , one of highest value for μmR-polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Percentage Efficiency or Performace Efficiency Coefficient
2. This polymer: Unspecified type of polymer

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "this polymer".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The PCE of this polymer is 1.1%.

Material Name: this polymer.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE based on this polymer arrived 1.1% , one of highest value for μmR-polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Percentage Efficiency of the Polymer Conjugate Effector (or Polymer Catalyst Effector)
2. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer in this context.
3. 1.1%: Percentage value of the PCE for the specific polymer.
4. highest value: A comparative property value for μmR-polymers.
5. μmR-polymers: Unspecified type of polymers with microRNA functionality.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE: Percentage Efficiency
2. 1.1%: Percentage value of the PCE
3. μmR-polymers: Type of polymers.

The PCE for the μmR-polymers is 1.1%.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Percentage Efficiency (PCE) |
| 1.1% |
| Property of: μmR-polymers |

The PCE for μmR-polymers is 1.1%.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE based on this polymer arrived 1.1% , one of highest value for μmR-polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Percentage of Covalent Enthalpy (or efficiency)
2. 1.1%: Value of PCE for the given polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. 1.1%: Value (representing the percentage of Covalent Enthalpy or efficiency for the given polymer).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1.1% |
| (representing the percentage of Covalent Enthalpy or efficiency for the given polymer) |

Note: Since the paragraph only mentions one property value, it is presented as is. If there were multiple property values mentioned, each one would be listed separately in the table.
